name: Quest for freedom
description:
entry for LD#42

Throw you enemy out of the arena.  Platforms going to disappear after a time, making the player running out of the space ;)

Commands:

A - Left 

D - Right

Space - Jump

Mouse 1 - Fire

Please rate this game in LD site: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/42/quest-for-freedom
